trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class that defines the methods, properties and events common to all controls in the <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.WebControls" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 用作定义 <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.WebControls" /> 命名空间中的所有控件的公共方法、属性和事件的基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class provides the properties, methods, and events that are common to all Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类提供属性、 方法和事件所共有的所有 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of a Web server control by setting properties defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置此类中定义的属性控制的外观和行为的 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the background color and font color of a control are controlled by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，通过使用控制的背景色和字体颜色的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以显示边框的控件，你可以控制的边框宽度、 边框样式和边框颜色通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The size of a Web server control can be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用指定的 Web 服务器控件的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of the control can be specified by setting certain properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置某些属性指定控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: You can enable and disable a control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以启用和禁用控件的设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The place of the control in the tab order is controlled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置控制的 tab 键顺序中的控件的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a ToolTip for the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置指定控件的工具提示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Not all controls support every property defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有控件都支持此类中定义的每个属性。

trans-unit.source: For specific information about whether a property is supported, see the documentation for the specific control.
trans-unit.target: 有关属性是否受支持的特定信息，请参阅特定控件的文档。

trans-unit.source: Some properties in this class render differently, depending on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 此类中的某些属性呈现方式不同，具体取决于浏览器中。

trans-unit.source: Some properties do not render at all, while others render, but have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 其他呈现，但不起作用，某些属性不在所有呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object determines the way in which a Web server control renders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>对象确定在其中一个 Web 服务器控件呈现的方式。

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support HTML 4.0, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A> property will contain a regular <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object, and most properties will be rendered using HTML 4.0 style attributes.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器支持 HTML 4.0<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A>属性将包含正则表达式<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>对象，并且大多数属性将呈现使用 HTML 4.0 样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Browsers that are not known to support HTML 4.0 will use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 将使用的浏览器不知道是否支持 HTML 4.0<xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter>对象。

trans-unit.source: This will automatically map the style attributes to any relevant HTML 3.2 tag attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这会自动映射到任何相关的 HTML 3.2 标记特性的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, such as with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property, the style attributes will be converted into additional tags, such as `<font>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，如与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>属性，样式特性将转换为其他标记，如`<font>`标记。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, there will be no mapping performed.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，将没有映射执行。

trans-unit.source: For specific information about how a property is rendered in different browsers, see the documentation for the specific property.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将属性呈现在不同的浏览器中的特定信息，请参阅特定属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 文件扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置使您得以快速导航到 Web 服务器控件的访问键。

trans-unit.source: The access key for quick navigation to the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 用于快速定位到 Web 服务器控件的访问键。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property to specify the keyboard shortcut for the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to navigate quickly to the control by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过按键盘上的 ALT 键和指定的字符的密钥快速导航到控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the access key of a control to the string `"D"` indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将控件的访问密钥设置为 string`"D"`指示用户可以导航到该控件通过按 ALT + D。

trans-unit.source: Only a single character string is allowed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 仅是单字符字符串可用于进行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, <xref:System.String.Empty>, nor a single character string, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试将此属性设置为一个值，既不是`null`， <xref:System.String.Empty>，也不是单字符字符串，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to set and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置和使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The specified access key is neither <see langword="null" />, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> nor a single character string.
trans-unit.target: 指定的访问键不是 <see langword="null" />、<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，也不是单个字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" />.
trans-unit.target: 将需要呈现的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: To render attributes and styles for a Web Server control on the client, you typically call the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 若要将呈现客户端上的 Web 服务器控件的特性和样式，通常调用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来插入每个特性和样式单独到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>输出流。

trans-unit.source: To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 若要简化过程，此方法封装了对所有调用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>对于每个属性和与 Web 服务器控件关联的样式的方法。

trans-unit.source: All attributes and styles are inserted into the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream in a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 所有特性和样式都插入到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>在单个方法调用的输出流。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for the class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常重写由控件开发人员在派生类中，若要将适当的特性和样式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>类的输出流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method cannot be used to insert client script.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法无法用于插入客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: To use client script, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用客户端脚本，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 基实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法被重写，以添加到派生的类中相应的特性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>输出流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，表示要复制的样式。

trans-unit.source: Copies any nonblank elements of the specified style to the Web control, overwriting any existing style elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式的所有非空白元素复制到 Web 控件，覆盖控件的所有现有的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ApplyStyle%2A> method to apply a style to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ApplyStyle%2A>方法来对其应用样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of arbitrary attributes (for rendering only) that do not correspond to properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与控件的特性不对应的任意特性（只用于呈现）的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection" /> of name and value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 名称和值对的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> collection contains a collection of all attributes declared in the opening tag of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>集合包含在 Web 服务器控件的开始标记中声明的所有特性的集合。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the attributes associated with a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你以编程方式控制与 Web 服务器控件关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can add attributes to the collection or remove attributes from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将属性添加到集合，或从集合中移除属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is rendered with all attributes in the collection in the control’s opening tag, regardless of the browser settings.
trans-unit.target: 此属性呈现使用控件的开始标记，而不考虑浏览器设置中的集合中的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Not all browsers support every attribute that is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有浏览器支持呈现的每个属性。

trans-unit.source: The unsupported attributes are usually ignored by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 通过浏览器通常忽略属性不受支持。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add client-side script to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> instance using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加客户端将脚本保存到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>实例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: To add client-side script, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加客户端脚本，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>控件。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>可以用于运行 JavaScript 命令时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件失去焦点。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件背景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> property to specify the background color of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用设置<xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: This property will render for only certain controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将只为某些控件呈现。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> will render this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>将呈现此属性。

trans-unit.source: It will also work for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`.
trans-unit.target: 它还将适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>如果其`RepeatLayout`属性是`RepeatLayout.Table`，而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。

trans-unit.source: In general, only controls that render as a `<table>` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，仅呈现为`<table>`标记可以显示的背景色 HTML 3.2 中而几乎任何控件可以在 HTML 4.0。

trans-unit.source: For controls that render as a `<span>` tag (including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later, but not in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.
trans-unit.target: 控件的呈现为`<span>`标记 (包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，所有验证控件和列表控件使用其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`)，此属性将在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 及更高版本，但不是工作在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control, which is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the Web control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 控件的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的边框颜色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property to specify the border color of the Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用设置<xref:System.Drawing.Color>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property will render only for certain controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>属性将只为某些呈现控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> controls will render this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控件将呈现此属性。

trans-unit.source: It will also work for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controls, if their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`.
trans-unit.target: 它还将适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制，如果其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`，而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。

trans-unit.source: However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which is not part of the HTML 3.2 standard.
trans-unit.target: 但是，呈现为`bordercolor`特性，它不是 HTML 3.2 标准的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The `bordercolor` attribute works for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.0 or later, but not most other browsers.
trans-unit.target: `bordercolor`属性适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 3.0 或更高版本，但不是大多数其他浏览器。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property is not set, the browser will use its default border color.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>未设置属性，浏览器将使用其默认边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Refer to your browser to determine its default color scheme.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅你的浏览器，以确定其默认颜色方案。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control, which is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property to specify the border style for the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用其中一个设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Border Style
trans-unit.target: 边框样式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The border style is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未设置的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: No border
trans-unit.target: 无边框

trans-unit.source: A dotted line border.
trans-unit.target: 虚线边框。

trans-unit.source: A dashed line border.
trans-unit.target: 点划线边框。

trans-unit.source: A solid line border.
trans-unit.target: 实线边框。

trans-unit.source: A solid double line border.
trans-unit.target: 双实线边框。

trans-unit.source: A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.
trans-unit.target: 用于凹陷边框外观的凹槽状边框。

trans-unit.source: A ridged border for a raised border appearance.
trans-unit.target: 用于凸起边框外观的突起边框。

trans-unit.source: An inset border for a sunken control appearance.
trans-unit.target: 用于凹陷控件外观的内嵌边框。

trans-unit.source: An outset border for a raised control appearance.
trans-unit.target: 用于凸起控件外观的外嵌边框。

trans-unit.source: This property will not render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer 4 for any Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将不早于任何 Web 服务器控件的 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4 呈现在浏览器中。

trans-unit.source: There is no equivalent to it in HTML 3.2.
trans-unit.target: 没有向其 HTML 3.2 中的无等效项。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control, which is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> that represents the border width of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" />，表示 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Empty" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> property to specify a border width for a control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>属性来指定控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property does not work with all Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性并不适用于所有 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: It applies only to controls that display as a table, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 它仅适用于这些控件将显示为表，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> contains a negative number, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>包含负号，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The border width can be expressed only in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.
trans-unit.target: 可以仅以对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 的浏览器的像素为单位表示的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: All unit types are supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更高版本中支持所有单元类型。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the specific control for details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅特定控件有关的详细信息。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Web 服务器控件的样式。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that encapsulates the appearance properties of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，它封装 Web 服务器控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property encapsulates all properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class that specify the appearance of the control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性封装的所有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类指定的外观的控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object has been created for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 属性创建了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object has been created for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle" /> property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 属性创建了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle" /> 对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> that represents the source control with properties to be copied to the Web server control that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />，它表示属性要复制到从中调用此方法的 Web 服务器控件的源控件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties not encapsulated by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style" /> object from the specified Web server control to the Web server control that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style" /> 对象未封装的属性从指定的 Web 服务器控件复制到从中调用此方法的 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CopyBaseAttributes%2A> method copies the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> properties from the specified Web server control to the Web server control that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CopyBaseAttributes%2A>方法副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>到 Web 服务器控件从调用此方法时，从指定的 Web 服务器控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used in cases where a Web server control works by dynamically creating new controls while it is rendering and using the controls.
trans-unit.target: 这通常使用在其中一个 Web 服务器控件的工作原理是动态创建新控件，而是在呈现和使用的控件的情况下。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in this situation because it copies all properties of Web server controls not encapsulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object so they can be placed on the outermost control of a tag that is being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是在此情况下有用，因为复制的未包装的 Web 服务器控件的所有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象，以便可以将它们放置在呈现的标记的最外面的控件上。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="controlSrc" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="controlSrc" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the style object that is used internally by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> class to implement all style related properties.
trans-unit.target: 创建由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> 类在内部用来实现所有与样式有关的属性的样式对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that is used to implement all style-related properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，用于实现该控件的所有与样式有关的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is used to create the style object that is used internally to implement all style related properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法用于创建样式内部使用，用于实现所有样式的对象与相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this method to create a style that is appropriate to the class.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以重写此方法以创建一个适合于类的样式。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Control developers should return a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> that the base control returns.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**控件开发人员应返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>基控件返回。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be assumed that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> is of a particular Style type since a derived control may return a different type.
trans-unit.target: 它不能假定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属于特定样式类型，因为派生的控件可能返回不同的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) class rendered by the Web server control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 Web 服务器控件在客户端呈现的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class rendered by the Web server control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 由 Web 服务器控件在客户端呈现的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性来指定要在 Web 服务器控件的客户端上呈现的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: This property will render on browsers for all controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将呈现在浏览器中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: It will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 它将始终呈现为的类特性，而不考虑浏览器中。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.target: 以下 HTML 呈现在客户端以前的 Web 服务器控件声明上：

trans-unit.source: If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of a control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 级联样式表 (CSS) 用于自定义控件的外观，如果使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不要同时。

trans-unit.source: Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性可以更改的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件。

trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the rendered HTML element when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在控件处于禁用状态时应用于呈现的 HTML 元素的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class that should be applied to the rendered HTML element when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 应在控件处于禁用状态时应用于呈现的 HTML 元素的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "aspNetDisabled".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“aspNetDisabled”。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to change the name that is rendered for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A> property of individual Web controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于更改为呈现名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A>的单个 Web 控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, this property returns "aspNetDisabled".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性返回"aspNetDisabled"。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> is overridden in a derived class to return `false`, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A> property is rendered as the value of the `class` attribute of the HTML element for the control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>返回派生的类中重写`false`的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A>属性呈现的值为`class`该控件的 HTML 元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if there is a value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property, both CSS classes will be applied to the rendered HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下中的值是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性，这两个 CSS 类将应用于所呈现的 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The `class` attribute will consist of the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A> property followed by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property, separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: `class`属性将包含的值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A>属性的值之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性，以空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: This property is static, which means that you can set it only for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是静态的这意味着你可以将仅对其进行设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Whatever value you set it to is used for all controls in a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为任意值用于 Web 应用程序中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify different values for individual controls.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定不同的单个控件的值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a class name different from the default value of "aspNetDisabled", you typically put the code to do that in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用的类名"aspNetDisabled"的默认值不同，通常情况下将用于在执行该操作的代码`Application_Start`方法的 Global.asax 文件中，如下面的示例中所示：

trans-unit.source: The following example shows rendered HTML for a disabled <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> property is `false`, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A> property has its default value, and when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了已禁用的呈现的 HTML<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>属性是`false`，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A>属性具有其默认值，以及何时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性为空。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows rendered HTML under the same conditions except that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property has the value "SampleStyle"`:`
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示相同的条件下呈现 HTML 只不过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性具有值"SampleStyle"`:`

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web server control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if control is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of a control is set to `false`, the control typically appears dimmed.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>控件的属性设置为`false`，控件通常显示为灰色。

trans-unit.source: If the control is an input element, the browser prevents the user from clicking or typing in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是一个输入的元素，浏览器可以阻止用户单击或在其中键入内容。

trans-unit.source: HTML elements that are rendered for a server control are marked as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器控件呈现的 HTML 元素被标记为禁用通过设置其`disabled`属性或其 CSS`class`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> 和 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This property propagates down the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将沿控件层次结构传播。

trans-unit.source: If you disable a container control, the child controls within that container are also disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用容器控件，还将禁用该容器内的子控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: In a custom composite control, this inheritance behavior does not apply to controls that have not yet created their child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在自定义的复合控件中，此继承行为不适用于尚未创建其子控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: You must either set the enabled state of the child controls when they are created, or override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须是将设置的启用的状态的子控件在创建，或重写时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性来调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Disabling a control only prevents interaction with the control by the user through the browser UI.
trans-unit.target: 禁用控件只会阻止与用户通过浏览器 UI 控件的交互。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a user to craft a request that submits a postback that is processed by the page even if controls on the page are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 它是用户可以生成请求，提交页来处理，即使禁用了该页上的控件的回发。

trans-unit.source: Before you process a postback request, check to make sure that the control is enabled and visible.
trans-unit.target: 处理回发请求之前，请检查以确保控件已启用且可见。

trans-unit.source: Not all controls support this property.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有控件都支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: See the individual controls for details.
trans-unit.target: 查看有关详细信息的单个控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何启用和禁用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类，通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示主题是否应用于该控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use themes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用主题，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A> property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A>属性指示是否为指定的控件启用主题。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A> property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A>属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录搜索要应用的控件外观。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用外观。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A> property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SkinID%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A>属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SkinID%2A>未使用属性。

trans-unit.source: A control can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A> value set by its parent control or the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A>值由其父控件或包含的页的设置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a parent control has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A> property set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls that are contained within the parent by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果父控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A>属性设置为`false`，您可以有选择地应用于通过设置父项中包含的子控件的主题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.EnableTheming%2A>属性`true`上各个子控件。

trans-unit.source: Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level.
trans-unit.target: 可以在页、 容器或控制级别启用主题。

trans-unit.source: When theming is disabled at the page or container level, themes are disabled for all controls that are contained by the page or container.
trans-unit.target: 当在页面或容器级别禁用主题时，禁用页面或容器中包含的所有控件的主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font properties associated with the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 Web 服务器控件关联的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> that represents the font properties of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" />，表示 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> property to specify the font properties of the Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`).
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含可访问的子属性以声明方式以形式`Property-Subproperty`(例如`Font-Bold`) 或以编程方式中的窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如`Font.Bold`)。

trans-unit.source: All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的所有控件之前的浏览器中将呈现所有但一个子属性。

trans-unit.source: They are: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work).
trans-unit.target: 它们是： <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>(但仅如名为字体大小`Small`， `Smaller`，依此类推，起作用)。

trans-unit.source: Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than later browsers.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这些子属性呈现在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 之前的浏览器中，是不同于更高版本浏览器呈现的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `<b>` and `<font>`.
trans-unit.target: 而不是呈现为样式特性，这些子属性呈现为 HTML 元素，如`<b>`和`<font>`。

trans-unit.source: The one subproperty that will not render on earlier browsers for all controls is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将不会呈现在较早的所有控件的浏览器的一个子属性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> property to gather font information from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>属性以收集相关字体信息从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color (typically the color of the text) of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的前景色（通常是文本颜色）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件前景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property to specify the foreground color of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The foreground color is usually the color of the text.
trans-unit.target: 前景色通常是文本的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This property will render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls, except the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将呈现在浏览器上早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的所有控件，除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>。

trans-unit.source: On browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, this property is rendered as `<font>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器上早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4，此属性呈现为`<font>`标记。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control, inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has attributes set.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否具有特性集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has attributes set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件有特性集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.HasAttributes%2A> property returns `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> instance has attribute name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.HasAttributes%2A>属性返回`true`时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>实例都有属性名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: The attribute pairs can be set either in the property or in the view state.
trans-unit.target: 在属性中或中的视图状态，则可以设置的属性对。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> that represents the height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件高度的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> property to specify the height of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的浏览器中的所有控件的呈现。

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, and any validation controls.
trans-unit.target: 无法呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性的控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和任何验证控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>也不呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性时其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers.
trans-unit.target: 此外，只有单元类型的`Pixel`和`Percentage`较早的浏览器都支持。

trans-unit.source: Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.
trans-unit.target: 由于此属性为非标准 HTML，Web 服务器控件显示为表，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>，不支持此属性在浏览器中早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> property to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>单元属性类型不是默认的`Pixel`，你必须创建新的单位类型特定于所需的单位类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, to set a control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要设置控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>属性到 100 的百分比值，你可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: For more information on the unit types available for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息可用于在单位类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control, inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件，继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>基类。

trans-unit.source: The height was set to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 高度被设置为负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> object is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> 对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个只读属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to disable a control, you set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要禁用的控件，则设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: If a control is not contained by another control, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property is always the same as the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不包含由另一个控件的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性始终是相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property has a value that is different from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property if a control is a child of another control and if all the following circumstances are true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性具有值不同于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性如果控件是另一个控件的子级，并且所有以下情况下为真：

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property of the parent control is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>父控件的属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of the child control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>子控件的属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the child control inherits the disabled state of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，子控件将继承父控件的已禁用的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property of the child control returns `false` to indicate that the control is disabled even though the child control was not explicitly disabled by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>子控件的属性返回`false`以指示该控件禁用，即使子控件已不显式禁用通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The parent control itself might have its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property set to `true` but might inherit the disabled state from its parent, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 父控件本身可能将其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性设置为`true`但可能会从其父项继承禁用的状态，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET renders HTML elements for a server control, it marks the elements as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 呈现时的服务器控件的 HTML 元素时，它可以标记的元素，因为禁用设置其`disabled`属性或其 CSS`class`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> 和 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> 方法保存的上一个请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.LoadViewState%2A> method restores the view-state information that was saved during a previous <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A> request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.LoadViewState%2A>方法还原已在上一个过程中保存的视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A>请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>方法以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，表示要复制的样式。

trans-unit.source: Copies any nonblank elements of the specified style to the Web control, but will not overwrite any existing style elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式的所有非空白元素复制到 Web 控件，但不覆盖该控件现有的任何样式元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.MergeStyle%2A> method to merge a style with the style of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.MergeStyle%2A>方法合并具有的样式的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。
